name: Invader War 入侵者之戰
description:
★★ Invader War - The Beginning! ★★

Long, long ago in a galaxy far, far away...
After NACE has finished war with Bim Bim, an enemy of theirs, The boss of the Bim Bim, Halues, wanted revenge and tried to destroy our planets and their NACE base. The Universe Defender Service has gone on strike, leaving the job to defend the Universe on NACE. Now it is up to YOU to brave the dangers to destroy their base.

★ Invader War was originally written by Lim Ding Wen for the Apple IIGS computer when he was 8. The iPhone version is written in HTML5.

★★ Special thanks! ★★
To Mr Brendan Robert for the excellent music!

★★ About Lim Ding Wen ★★
http://dingwen.virtual-gs.com
